aboutUs: Deck Masters AK is a premier contracting company based in Anchorage, AK, dedicated to transforming outdoor living spaces and enhancing home exteriors. With years of experience serving the Anchorage community, we specialize in high-quality deck construction, comprehensive exterior renovations, and expert general contracting services. Our commitment to craftsmanship, integrity, and client satisfaction ensures every project, from custom wraparound decks to complex siding and structural repairs, is handled with meticulous attention to detail and unwavering professionalism. We pride ourselves on building lasting relationships and delivering results that stand the test of time, perfectly suited to Alaska's unique climate.
address: 625 W 59th Ave Unit J, Anchorage, AK 99518, USA
tagline: Crafting Exceptional Outdoor Spaces, Built to Endure Alaska's Beauty.

rawReviews.text: Jordan and his team are outstanding. I cannot recommend them enough! They took an old dilapidated deck and stairs and made them beautiful. They are gracious, easy to work with, and talented.
rawReviews.author: Diane Michalski

rawReviews.text: Had my new deck built byDeckMaster. From demo to finish they did a great job!  Their crew were great, esp Jeffery, who was easy to work with, & answered my questions as they came up!   Completed by timeframe as promised!
rawReviews.author: Mary Berger

rawReviews.text: Deck Masters was fantastic to deal with! At a time where I absolutely needed a helping hand they responded the same day! Jackie was great to deal with and very professional. I am definitely considering them to replace my fence, front and back porch next summer.
rawReviews.author: Steve Day

rawReviews.text: Deckmasters honored their warranty even though we are the second homeowners. I can't say enough good things about Jordan and this company. If you are looking to have a deck built, it would be a mistake to go elsewhere. Thank you Jordan, I'll be in contact when I'm ready to do my back deck.
rawReviews.author: Robert Muncy

rawReviews.text: I am a Realtor and Deck Masters was a great company one of my clients worked with. Responsive, prompt and they did a great job with a deck demo needed on a home.
rawReviews.author: Beth Wilson

rawReviews.text: I worked for deck masters for a short time.  It was a great job.  This company is full of positive and knowledgeable people.   Fantastic place to work if you want to learn how to frame the right way and build awesome custom decks!
rawReviews.author: Edmond Gullikson

rawReviews.text:
We were asked to give an honest review of our new deck that was recently finished by Deck Masters. OK!
First and foremost, we are so happy with our new deck and how it turned out.  As a homeowner you always wonder how a big project like this will turn out when you're in the long planning/waiting phase.  These guys nailed it, truly.  The railing system we had installed is truly stunning! Shoutout to Sean who was especially awesome and showed a very professional demeanor, he even asked to come work on the weekend to help finish our deck railing on time(Thank you!).  We had a deck board that we found had been damaged, and a piece of trim we wanted fixed.  They made it known that it would be quickly/happily fixed which they did! Deck 5 out of 5 stars.
We were originally told our project would start late July with the possibility of it starting sooner when we put our deposit down in May.  We had not heard anything last week of July so I reached out and was told they were running behind and it wouldn't be til late august.  We were frustrated and decided to cancel the project because we figured it was to late in the summer that we wouldn't be able to enjoy it.  I quickly received a call from the owner Jordan who was apologetic and assured me our project was next and would start in a few days.  He mentioned that our project would take about a week to a week and a half.  We decided to continue with the project.  They did start the project just a few days later.
Our deck took nearly six weeks from start to finish.  There was spans of several days and even well over a week where we wouldn't hear from or see anyone during this time.  Prompting us to reach out and get an update several times.  We were usually told that they were waiting on supplies or needed to order something else.  We started to feel like the planning was either last minute for the orders or they just had bitten off more than they could chew with projects this year.
Our advice?  Most customers realize how much things can change with deadlines, material, etc.  It's easier for us to be flexible if you keep us in the loop, even with the smallest details.
Thanks again for our wonderful new deck.  Would definitely use Deck Masters again.

*EDIT*
Was called personally by the owner, Jordan shortly after this review.  It's obvious how important customer satisfaction is to him.  We had a nice conversation and he took full credit for the delays during our project, even though some of the items were out of his control (Spenard Builders Supply closing one of their locations this summer creating serious issues with product availability) and he made NO excuses.  Thanks for driving out to our home, and thank you for the nice mug!
rawReviews.author: Matthew Freckleton

rawReviews.text: Deck looks great, guys were easy to work with. Happy with the deck.
rawReviews.author: Heath Austin

rawReviews.text: We were buying a house with a deck that had been built incorrectly and Deckmasters fixed it to where its safe and enjoyable for many years to come.  There was some hiccups along the process but Jordan made things right and clearly cares a lot about the reputation of the business and is an honest guy.  Would recommend!
rawReviews.author: Tristen Thron

rawReviews.text: After a year of attempting to have my deck repaired or rebuilt, I was ready to give up on the project. No shows on bids, "I'll get back with you" comments, we are booked, etc. etc. I called Deck Masters. A representative came within a few days, made a rough drawing with dimensions and gave me preliminary suggestions and ideas. A short time later I received a bid (lower than most big box stores) with a detailed explanation of construction steps, fees, lumber sizes, supports required, and a lot of other detailed information. I was amazed at the details. I accepted the contract and set a completion date. The work was truly amazing. The old deck was removed with no damage to the existing house, and all was hauled away. A framework was constructed that looked bomb proof. When the Trex decking was applied it truly became a masterpiece with their picture frame method. When the railing was added the deck became a work of art. I was totally satisfied that all my questions had been answered patiently. Any suggestions I had were considered. If I wanted something that was not construction worthy, the lead worker let me know and explained why. All of the workers appeared highly trained and aware of their responsibilities. The office was in contact with me during construction and boosted my confidence. When the deck was completed, I was sort of glad that all the previous contractors had dropped out, maybe that was good. The new deck has enhanced the appearance of my home. I highly recommend folks take their time with a deck project to insure they get the best. That is what I got with Deck Masters AK.
rawReviews.author: James Wheeler

rawReviews.text: DeckMasters did a job for one of my clients recently and I was thoroughly impressed with their timeliness and professionalism throughout!! Great communication also, which always makes for a wonderful working experience.
rawReviews.author: Jay Bruzas

rawReviews.text: Had an 8’x20’ deck built this summer. It turned out awesome. Quality workmanship and seamless execution.
rawReviews.author: SEAN BAGINSKI

rawReviews.text: Excellent crew, great communication.  Plans changed mid-stream and the Deck Master team did a terrific job at adjusting to the new plans.  Definitely two thumbs up!
rawReviews.author: Steve Judd

rawReviews.text:
We had our deck replaced by Jordan and his team, and the experience was fantastic from start to finish. They were honest, up front, and truly a pleasure to work with. Our project involved replacing a small second-story deck with a much larger one made from Trex, which was no small feat given the complexities of permitting, tight utility corridors, and the installation of pilings.

Despite these challenges, Jordan and his team delivered a beautiful result. Our new deck receives compliments constantly from neighbors and passersby. Moreover, they stood by their warranty and replaced a center support beam that had developed a large crack. Although the crack did not compromise the integrity of the beam, they wanted to ensure our complete satisfaction and replaced it without hesitation.

We highly recommend Jordan and his team for their professionalism, craftsmanship, and dedication to customer satisfaction.
rawReviews.author: Kyle Van Peursem

rawReviews.text: Very impressive service from beginning to end of project. Jackie was amazing to work with , so knowledgeable and patient.  Crew came took down old deck in a day and quickly put up new. Definitely 5 star service all round.
rawReviews.author: Darla Battle

rawReviews.text: Great working with Jordan and the team. Very helpful setting things up and working with us to design the deck we were looking for. Once the work started, they were done very expeditiously and left the area clean. High quality products from a high quality company. Strongly recommend.
rawReviews.author: Erik Gonsalves

rawReviews.text: Deck Masters AK we’re absolutely outstanding to work with, our project ran into roadblocks, dealing with the municipality, but they stood by us and supported every step from start to finish. The finished deck was just what we wanted, and the build quality was outstanding. I highly recommend their services to anyone needing a new or replacement deck.
rawReviews.author: Tom Locklair

rawReviews.text: Our deck is just small and simple but is nicely done! Jordan was easy to deal with and provided prompt responses and quotes based on our needs. I highly recommend them for any deck work, truly are deck masters! Thank you so much!
rawReviews.author: Maria ORTILLA

rawReviews.text: Thank you DeckMasters Team for my beautiful deck.  I was pleasantly surprised to learn that they can build in the wintertime in Alaska!  Their quote was everything they promised.  Jackie did a wonderful job of communicating with me regarding timelines and what could be expected.  They are extremely professional and answered all my questions and concerns with certainty.  I can't wait for the sun to come out and enjoy my deck for years to come!!
rawReviews.author: Jennifer LaFramboise

rawReviews.text: Great experience all around!  Highly recommend!
rawReviews.author: Will Warren

rawReviews.text: Jackie and Jeff were amazing to work with! They walked us through the process and made sure we were on track every step of the way. They helped us get to a price point we were happy with and removed our old crumbling deck. Our new deck was completed ahead of schedule and it looks incredible. We are very happy with our new deck. I highly recommend Deck Masters!
rawReviews.author: Chris Taylor

rawReviews.text:
I have worked with Deck Masters for several years, Jordan and his crew are always friendly and professional.
They take pride in their work,and it shows in the decks they build.
I would highly recommend them for any deck project big or small.
rawReviews.author: Daniel Hepler

rawReviews.text:
I whish to thank Sean and Rayne of Deck Masters for the outstanding experience I had with then as they repaired my deck.
They came out looked at the damage, formulated a plan and went to work.  Despite the February weather they quickly removed all of the rotten/ broken decking and supports. Without asking they explained the repair process. Why they were doing what and why it was being done that way. The new wood was fitted into place with what, looked easy-going to me. The mess was cleaned up and the job was finished in
just  two days.
I also want to thank Jackie for putting up with my phones calls. She kept me posted as to my progress on the wait list. She was always polite and upbeat.

THANKS TO ALL
MIKE SHAUGHNESSY
rawReviews.author: Mike Shaughnessy

rawReviews.text:
Don’t look anywhere else - BEST IN THE BUSINESS in the Anchorage area! After several quotes from others, we were so confident with our choice to go with them. We had a great experience from our initial consult all the way to the installation. While there was one hiccup during installation, everything was in perfect condition not even 24 hours after expressing this to Jordan.

Professional, quick, communicative and just very, very pleasant! We are so happy with our new deck!
rawReviews.author: Katelynn Rowe

rawReviews.text: Jordan and his crew did an amazing job with our deck project! We greatly appreciate the above and beyond effort his company exemplified in our very complicated, time consuming project. We are beyond happy with how it turned out and very thankful we chose Deckmasters!
rawReviews.author: Arne Krogh

rawReviews.text: Deckmasters build an incredibly sturdy and attractive large back deck for me in 2023.  The crew worked hard, was friendly and courteous, and came up with creative solutions to unique challenges, including accommodating two trees that pass through the deck.  I would certainly consider hiring them again when I have my front deck rebuilt.
rawReviews.author: Tim Bowman

rawReviews.text: Replacing our 60ftx10ft deck sounded pretty intimidating for me. I put it off for several years, but knew it needed to be done...and built correctly. Jordan and his team at Deck Masters were outstanding through every step. They were so helpful in making decisions, yet never pushy at all. They even encouraged us to get a couple other quotes to make sure we wanted them to go ahead with the project. I thought decks could only be done during the summer, but the Deck Master team built our deck in less than two weeks starting the last week of November. We are excited to use our deck even more during the summer. Thank you, Jordan and team, for a job well done!
rawReviews.author: Joseph Leman

rawReviews.text: Deck Masters had to work around Mother Nature’s November snowstorm and built me a beautiful new deck! Jordan, Jackie and the whole crew were great to work with! Thank you to you and your crew!
rawReviews.author: Debbie Bradow

rawReviews.text: I chose to work with Deck Masters this last summer to rebuild our deck.  Jordan and his team were responsive and transparent through the entire project. We ran in to a few obstacles over the course of the project and Jordan was there evey step of the way to answer questions and help troubleshoot. Jackie was always helpful when Jordan was unavailable to answer questions and relay messages. The on-site crew, Jeff, Robert, and Rayne, were professional and always happy to answer any questions I had. We ended up with a beautiful deck and are very happy customers!
rawReviews.author: Aaron Ellis

rawReviews.text: Had a deck built in my backyard. It came out great and in a very reasonable timeframe.
rawReviews.author: Christopher Steere

rawReviews.text:
This was a great experience!  First and foremost - I have a beautiful porch. Thank you!
Second - this was absolutely the nicest and sweetest group of guys. They were funny, pleasant, professional, efficient, diligent, and worked well as a team.
Third - they communicated with me. They noticed I have trouble with steps and made the steps easy for me to negotiate (no ‘Alaska steps’). They made sure t fencing around the porch was ‘dog proof’ - the porch is in the dog yard.
Fourth - they obviously take pride in their work. Everything is well done, and well finished to the point of being artistic.
Fifth - they were timely and coordinated - it was finished in about a total of 2 days.
Sixth - they cleaned up after themselves.
Awesome crew. Fantastic job.
rawReviews.author: Kas Healy

rawReviews.text: This summer, we hired Deck Masters to build out our second story deck. From the initial consultation with Jordan to the final product, my wife and I were very happy with the entire process. Every question we had was answered and Jordan gave us great recommendations based on his years of experience, which helped us narrow down our decisions. During the build, Jeff, the foreman, and his team, Robert and Rayne, were friendly, professional, and efficient. They completed absolutely beautiful work.
rawReviews.author: Anton Szender

rawReviews.text:
These pictures do not do this deck justice!  The workmanship is excellent right down to the last detail. But, beyond the obvious is the integrity and professionalism of Deck Masters. Jordan is an amazing young man who has created a quality company with virtue. We contracted them late in the year prior to leaving Alaska for the summer. Jordan’s crew worked during the winter months and we came home to a beautiful new deck in the spring. They took care of every issue, including working with the Muni on permitting.
They do what they say they’re going to do. Then they over deliver.  You will not be sorry with Deck Masters.
rawReviews.author: Mark Daly

rawReviews.text: Jordan was great to work with throughout the entire process from the first meeting until the deck was completely finished.  Every step was handled very professionally. The build team at Deck Masters, Jeff, Robert and Rayne were awesome, the deck turned out beautiful, we love it.  Thanks to everyone at Deck Masters for a great job. Rick and Jessica.
rawReviews.author: Rick Oelze

rawReviews.text: Wonderful company! they made getting our 2nd level deck rebuilt a breeze and communicate great the whole time! they were very respectful of our animals and did excellent work!
rawReviews.author: Jana Weltzin

rawReviews.text: Jordan and the crew did an awesome job of building out the awning for our existing deck! They were very quick to respond and got the entire job done within a few days. We started early in the week and were hosting a BBQ by the weekend, with nothing but compliments from our guests. Highly recommended!
rawReviews.author: Bomby Kitchpanich

rawReviews.text: This company is AMAZING!  They were able to take down my old deck in the middle of winter in one day...and start the new deck the next day.  They were done with the entire project in 3 days!  They are professional and deliver on all their promises.  I would recommend them highly.  Rita C.
rawReviews.author: Rita Corwin

rawReviews.text: Deck Masters provided excellent service, on schedule, & with amazing results.
rawReviews.author: Sherry Buckley

rawReviews.text: These guys are my hero’s!!! I was selling a house and an ice block broke the deck, we were closing the next week and needed a deck made fast. All the other companies told me I couldn’t get it done until July, Jordon from deck masters told me they could do it that day. They saved my deal and literally saved the day. This guys rocked and did an amazing job!!!!
rawReviews.author: chris darrow

rawReviews.text: ABOVE AND BEYONE SERVICE! Our front deck broke and Jordan helped us out ASAP. Highly highly recommend.
rawReviews.author: Morgan Zender

rawReviews.text:
Deckmasters overcame some significant design issues to deliver a very good final project.
Their workers are competent, respectful and take pride in their work.
Cost of the project is competitive compared to other deck builders in the Anchorage area.
Project started about 2 months later than original estimate and took somewhat longer than was projected.
rawReviews.author: Roger Sels

rawReviews.text:
DM brought my Pergola dream to life! I am so happy with my pergola. I wanted a tall privacy wall with my pergola and some where to have curtain rods, and a Walkway with stairs for my puppies. They created that for me with my ideas.  Justin listened to all of my ideas and I’m
So happy how he made it happen. From start to finish DM has been great to work with.

If you are looking for a good company that plays no games and mean business then Deck Masters & Jordan and his team are the ones that you need.

They are a business that I can trust and count on. I will be using them again because they are…

Attentive
Honest
Reliable
Punctual
Hard working
Trustworthy
Affordable
Good communication
Respectful
Attention to detail
Creative

Thank you
Deck masters!
rawReviews.author: Heidi St

rawReviews.text: We are very happy with how our new deck turned out!  Everyone involved; whether it was tearing down the old deck, to the clean up afterwards were so kind and helpful.  Justin did such an amazing job and was super meticulous with the work he did on the deck and stairs.  He went above and beyond and we are extremely happy with the finished product.  Thank you Deck Masters!
rawReviews.author: Melodye B

rawReviews.text: Would give this company less than one star if possible. Was charged $100 for someone to come out and give an estimate for redoing my deck. I wasn’t present for the “estimate”, but from my wife’s account it was wholly unprofessional. No measurements taken with the assurance that we would have an estimate by the end of the week. 2 weeks later no phone call, email, text or estimate and it’s clear this “company” is out to scam people. Beware!
rawReviews.author: Matthew Moglianesi

rawReviews.text: Deck Masters AK built a roughly 5' x 24' second floor elevated deck for us and the project went well from start to finish.  Matt the estimator communicated clearly and knew what he was doing and had good ideas for accomplishing our goals and giving us different options for design and materials.  Travis built the deck and his craftsmanship was superior.  They took care of permitting too and stayed on budget.  We had a good experience.
rawReviews.author: Adam Harki

rawReviews.text: Everyone in the company is very professional and eager to please.  They take the time to explain every step of the way.  I was able to watch much of the construction and was pleased with the professionalism and craftsmanship of Justin and Robert, who built the deck.  They, along with Matthew and Jordan were a pleasure with whom to work.  The deck is well built and a great looking addition to our home.
rawReviews.author: John Stalvey

rawReviews.text: We are thrilled with our experience with Deck Masters and Byron, the foreman on our project. First, what a professional, hard working, and nice guy! The rest of the DM team have been very communicative and professional. Our deck looks amazing and the quality is top-notch. We are planning a back deck next year and will definitely be using them again.
rawReviews.author: carrie harris

rawReviews.text: You will not find a better company than Deck Masters and Jordan and his crew.  They are extremely attentive to what you want and make sure you are happy every step of the way.  I absolutely love my deck and front porch that they built.  They are absolutely gorgeous.  I HIGHLY recommend having Jordan and his crew for your building needs!
rawReviews.author: Heather

rawReviews.text: Every time I shoveled snow off my decks this winter—and there were several times—I was reminded of what a beautiful job Jordan and his crew did in building two large decks on our hillside home. From start to finish, planning (helpful ideas and permitting with subdivisions and Muni) to completion (thorough cleanup and removal of all materials), they were always professional, obsessed with quality and respectful of timelines.  His price quote was competitive and he stuck to it--Even offered up a few small extras at no charge, while absorbing near continuous materials cost increases during the summer of Covid. We couldn’t be more pleased with the final result, and would not hesitate to use Jordan and Two Seasons on future projects.
rawReviews.author: mw

rawReviews.text:
When my husband said he wanted a new deck I was like oh boy... here we go dealing with unresponsive contractors, haggling with quotes and playing phone tags...
To my surprise, Deck Masters reached out right away and either called or showed up in person to discuss any changes/issues.
We instantly appreciated Jordan's responsiveness and detailed explanation over the phone which is hard to find these days.
Special kudos to Isaac and Robert who have been flexible to accommodate the changes/requests along the way.  They have gone above and beyond our expectation.
I can most definitely recommend Deck Masters (and I rarely recommend!)- good job guys and thank you!
rawReviews.author: Shannon Koh

rawReviews.text: Deck Masters built a beautiful deck on the back of our house where we previously had only a small set of stairs.  The deck exemplifies high quality construction and classic visual appeal.  The crew was professional in all aspects of the deck construction.  There were a couple of communication hiccups during the process, but Jordan was very quick to respond and work through any concerns.  I believe Deck Masters truly wants their clients to be completely satisfied with their work and the decks they build.........which we are.  I would definitely recommend Deck Masters to those in the market for a new deck.
rawReviews.author: SKG

rawReviews.text: Jordan was great about answering all my question, his crew  did great work and were friendly and always had a smile.  Communication is key with any project and they all did a great job with that.  I’m very happy with my deck.
rawReviews.author: Anesia S

rawReviews.text: Jordan and crew did a great job getting our deck restored prior to our house going  on the market.   Would definitely use Deck Masters AK on future projects.
rawReviews.author: Boomer Ross

rawReviews.text: What a great team - Jordan, Deck Masters - you all brought awesome skill and ability to to every project you completed this season.  We can't wait to see how many more memories you help create for your customers in 2021!
rawReviews.author: Michelle Myers

rawReviews.text:
Jordan & his crew did an absolutely amazing job, & the craftmanship is second to none.  They even picture framed the border, & made it look seamless per their construction practice.  They went above and beyond what we asked for & couldn't be happier with our new decks.

We will be enjoying them for many years to come & we would totally recommend them to anybody looking for a quality built decking that is made to last through the Alaska seasons.

Timewise was longer than we hoped, but Jordan made it right and was sure to be prompt when asking for questions answered.  Very professional & friendly to do business with, & we will be doing business again for future deck builds.

Some below "before & after" pictures of the decks, so you can see the difference in quality & craftmanship for yourselves.

Thank You Jordan & the Crew, you guys rock!!!!
rawReviews.author: Lovin’ AK Life

rawReviews.text: We hired Deck Masters for a small project and they did a fantastic job! We had a deadline for the completion date and Robert worked all weekend to ensure that we got it done as soon as possible. I would highly recommend this company to anyone. Next summer I plan to have them build me a new front deck!
rawReviews.author: Dylan Webb

rawReviews.text: Deck masters did an outstanding job with our deck; the end product looks excellent. We did have challenges with scheduling our deck construction and ended up having the build about 3 months after anticipated, and also had some minor issues along the way with miscommunication on design features that we picked up during the construction that had to be readjusted. However, I gave the company 5 stars because as soon as these issues were brought to Jordan's attention, he always complied in a professional and timely manner to get it done to our liking. I would recommend this service to others.
rawReviews.author: Greg Lisse

rawReviews.text: We contracted with Jordan to have them replace our old rickety front and back decks, as well as expand the back deck significantly. Got a little delayed start due to Covid hitting and the initial lockdowns earlier this year, and some delays on the aluminum railing materials due to the pandemic, but our decks are finally complete and we couldn't be happier with the quality of construction. These decks are solid! I appreciated when they offered to extend the back deck out an extra foot at no extra cost so that there would be less wasted decking material, added approximately 40 sq. ft. Justin was meticulous and did a fantastic job! This was the only good thing to come out of 2020.
rawReviews.author: Jonathan Packer

rawReviews.text: Once Two Seasons showed up on site, they worked steadily, with high quality and attention to detail. However, they appeared about a month later than expected, after many delays. The five star rating stands because we signed a contract without a completion date. The wrong railing material was delivered, which we fortunately discovered before installation. This was corrected and the specified materials were delivered rapidly. Also, the first crew members on site were unsure of the deck width dimension. Both problems would not have happened if the crew had had a copy of the plans and a materials list. That said, due to the quality of their work and their professionalism, we would definitely work with them again.
rawReviews.author: Therese Stokes

rawReviews.text: Jordan and his team did a fantastic job. We are pleased with the he outcome and look forward to enjoying a lot of time in our new deck.
rawReviews.author: Kristina Murray

rawReviews.text:
Jordan worked with me to redesign and replace my front porch after the earthquake.  They also replaced my fence gates. He was very patient due to delays with other work needing to be done first.
Matthew was the main carpenter and angled the walkway and porch boards. I love the artistic uniqueness of the way the front porch turned out. Also, the redone gates easily swing open with little effort.
I would recommend this company for any deck or fence work. They do a top notch job. I hope to eventually replace my fence and will be calling Deck Masters when I do.
rawReviews.author: t gr

rawReviews.text:
Due to safety concerns we had to replace the deck on our cabin in Willow. You would think that navigating that process from another state would be challenging. Not the case at all. We were fortunate to get connected to Deck Masters via another contractor. We explained what we wanted, saw and approved the plans and gave the go ahead to proceed. From the start of the project it was understood that we were traveling up there for vacation and the deck needed to be completed before our arrival.
Not only did Jordan and his team do a great job, they ran into some issues along the way that needed to be addressed and rather than short cut to make something work, we were made aware of these issues so we could play a role in deciding how to proceed. This communication level is key for decision making when you aren't in the same state and seeing the issues in person is not an option.
I have been a professional sales/customer service person for 20 years which comes with a high expectation when I am the customer. My expectations were exceeded every step of the way. If you need some work done and are looking for somebody you can trust,  you should definitely give these folks a call!
rawReviews.author: Andy Seppi

rawReviews.text:
The crew just completed replacing my large deck.
The work was done expediently, professionally and with attention to detail and quality.
Jordan, Matthew and Frank were always pleasant and courteous.  The work site was maintained clean an free of debris.
I plan to use deck masters (2 seasons) in the future, and won’t hesitate to recommend them.
rawReviews.author: Cathy Gohring

rawReviews.text: The team at Deck Masters were very professional and built a very high quality deck.  They were responsive to my questions and valued my input.
rawReviews.author: Ben Bell

rawReviews.text: We chose Jordan and his team at Deck Masters to replace the existing decks on our log home and we couldn’t be happier with our decision. From professional, stress-free brainstorming meetings to the finished product, every experience with this company has exceeded our expectations. Our decks are beautiful; the skill and craftsmanship is evident in all aspects of their work. Throughout the entire process, it was quite evident that our satisfaction was the highest priority to Jordan and his crew. We highly recommend Jordan, Matt, Frank and the entire team at Deck Masters to help make your deck dreams a stunning reality!
rawReviews.author: Nancy Konop

rawReviews.text: Had an extensive remodel done to my deck.   DeckMasters not only did an outstanding job but were very helpful in the design process as well.    Exceptionally easy to work with and very professional personnel both in management and the site crew
rawReviews.author: Russell Lewis

rawReviews.text:
For the past month, we have been enjoying the deck Jordan Webb and his team at DeckMasters built for us in Big Lake.  We sought quotes from a handful of builders in the area – some of whom never even got back to us – and were pleased to contract with Jordan and his team, who proved to be professional, tidy, and quick.  The demo of our old, dilapidated deck went smoothly and our vision for the new deck combined nicely with Jordan’s recommendations.  During construction, he considered our input and communicated with us regarding any challenges and necessary changes.  The deck he and his team built is well-configured, sturdy, and beautiful.  We love it.  We also enjoyed meeting Jordan’s young family, and appreciated how he served as a positive role model for his children. Jordan is proud of his work, and he has reason to be. We highly recommend Jordan Webb and DeckMasters!

Steve and Jody Simpson
Rocky Lake
rawReviews.author: Steve Simpson

rawReviews.text: Work was done to the highest standard and completed on schedule.  Its great to see there are still real craftsman who can work with wood as it should be done.  Two Seasons did that in spades.   Matt and Frank worked friendly and with great attention to detail.  Excellent design and construction to match.  I give them my highest recommendation.
rawReviews.author: Dan Bonzoni

rawReviews.text: Jordan and his team at Deck Masters AK are professional and do great work. From the moment you submit a request for a proposal, they are there to help you talk through the options and to help make your deck ideas become a reality.  They were open, communicative, and built our deck within the timeline that we were given.  Jordan and his team were open to communicating at every step of the way and take extreme pride in their work.
rawReviews.author: January O'Connor

rawReviews.text: 2 years ago we hired this company to rebuild our front deck, install a partial fence-line in the back yard, and upgrade our back deck railing. After 2 hard winters, our property experienced major frost heave which affected the work that had been done. We called and notified the owner of the company, and in under 10 days, he had sent out 2 different representatives from his company to investigate and resolve the issues; at no cost to us, he and his company honored the warranty. If you're looking to build or make upgrades on your property, we would highly recommend this company.
rawReviews.author: Matt Oberlander

rawReviews.text: We have never been more satisfied with the quality and workmanship of any project we have contracted in our 42 years of marriage.  Deck Masters owner, Jordan and his crew are great.. They are not only hard working, but were enjoyable to be around.  They are just good people.  Justin (the lead foreman)  is a perfectionist and an artist.  We are very fortunate that we found Deck Masters.  It was a very enjoyable process from the first meeting with Kevin to the completion of the project with Jordan.  We give Deck Masters our highest recommendation.
rawReviews.author: Jeff Gaylard

rawReviews.text: What I like about Deck Masters was they did the job right the first time and they completed the in a very timely matter. And they did a great job.
rawReviews.author: STUART MILLAR

rawReviews.text: Jordan has a wonderful company staffed with competent and reliable people. They have been very responsive to what I've needed to be done and they were willing to make changes/additions/subtractions as needed. They work in any kind of weather to make sure the job is done right! They have built a deck, porch, and fence for my property. Jordan also has very good relationships with other contractors in the construction industry. It took so much pressure off of me to know he was coordinating with the landscaper, pile drivers, and driveway company.
rawReviews.author: Janna Walker

rawReviews.text: Jordan is  professional and honest, and his crews were friendly and prompt. They were clean; there were no nails or construction debris left on  the premises that might cut our dogs' feet.  The deck is beautiful!  Solid construction, good attention to detail.  We appreciated Jordan's help in the design stage and the deck looks fantastic.
rawReviews.author: Dr. Pepper

rawReviews.text: Highly recommend, the experience working with them leaves nothing to be desired. From the estimate to the the work being done they were very knowledgeable and approachable through the the whole process.The work completed was not just thrown together they put a great deal of thought and craftsmanship into it and did not rush at all. The work is of the highest caliber and I could not be more impressed with the crew. I would recommend to anyone. If anybody is on the fence with you shouldn’t be feel free to contact me.
rawReviews.author: Ryan Orebaugh

rawReviews.text: Our new deck is more than we expected.  The gentlemen who worked on our deck are very polite as well as the other individuals affiliated with this company. These gentlemen go above and beyond what is necessary completed the job. They more than met our  expectations.
rawReviews.author: Leonette Steele

rawReviews.text: From the  beginning to of our deck extension  , professionalism was demonstrated,through out the entire project the end result was an aw-sum    deck that I would show anyone,I honestly believe that due to work performed as was done, I am the envy of my block for deck appearance ,ill put it against anywhere on this block, well done to you Jordan and  your professional  carpenters
rawReviews.author: Floyd Steele

rawReviews.text: Great guys and excellent craftsmanship. Deck Masters is a honest company whom I’d recommend to friends and family. My deck is beautiful cedar wood with custom built in benches. I couldn’t be happier!
rawReviews.author: Elise McCarter

rawReviews.text: Deck masters provided excellent service for our new deck project.  They listened to our ideas for how we wanted the deck build.  Deck masters worked with us during construction to ensure the project was completed professionally.  They incorporated our ideas for caps.  Deck masters worked with us when we needed to add cement during construction to ensure we had a big enough landing.  After 2 years, the deck is in great condition.
rawReviews.author: Jerel Price

rawReviews.text: I hired Deck Masters to do our deck and fence.  They did a great job on communication and adjusting their schedule to fit ours. The quality of craftsmanship is evident and we are very pleased with their work.  I would highly recommend them to anyone looking to build a deck.
rawReviews.author: Trenton Millar

rawReviews.text: I have to say these were the most friendly workers I have ever dealt with.  To be honest it’s kind of lonely without them around.  But the work they did for our deck was the best experience I had on any of our house remodel projects.  Along with that, the owner made sure that we were happy with the job and even checked the work as well.  I will definitely be contacting them again in the future!
rawReviews.author: Patience

rawReviews.text: Via a referral, and after researching a few other deck builders, I contacted Jordan Webb at Deck Masters, formally Two Seasons.  My first hint of the type business Jordan was running was when I was greeted with an immediate response requesting a meeting at the house so he could get a feel for what my wife and would like to have done. No other builder responded to that point, and when they did they basically said for what I wanted done they didn't need to visit the site. Needless to say, I wasn't comfortable with that. Man am I glad Jordan reached out. From the beginning Jordan explained what would happen and what we could expect. It was that way through the whole build. Pretty much right away, when our old deck was demoed and hauled away, they found some water damage under the vinyl siding of the house. They pointed out the problem area and told me they could fix if I wanted it done. They also did some math and explained that if I was ok with it, they could lower the deck where it connected to the house saving material while providing a little relief to my wallet in the process. This type of interaction took place throughout the entire build and I can't stress enough how much this was appreciated. By the time they finished and moved on I felt as though I made some new friends as opposed to a business contact. You simply can't beat that in todays world. I would like to extend a special thank you to Mathew and Trey for the work and attention to detail they provided. I HIGHLY recommend Deck Masters Alaska if you're looking to add a deck to your home. It simply turned out beautiful and right on the money for what we had pictured in our mind prior meeting these gentlemen.
rawReviews.author: Joseph Lotz

rawReviews.text: I want to say thank you so much to Deck Masters, Jordan, Travis, Matthew and Trey! From the original meeting, the communication to ensure that our visions matched, the professionalism and the hard work of the entire crew, to the final product- I couldn’t be happier. I actually cried a little I was so happy. My deck is a masterpiece and I will enjoy it for many years to come!! THANK YOU ♥️♥️♥️!!!!!!
rawReviews.author: Sherri Mulhaney

rawReviews.text: Got bids from multiple companies but Jordan came out and made us comfortable with the project plan and process. Even getting our deck done in the middle of winter they worked fast and had the projects wrapped up in 2 weeks. From Jackie in the office to Jeff our onsite foreman, everyone was professional and really easy to work with.
rawReviews.author: Andrew Neuerburg

rawReviews.text: We had damage to our deck railing during a big wind storm. Deck Masters was able to remove the old railing and install a new, sturdier cable wire railing! We also had new stairs put in because the old ones were in an area that heaved too much in the winter. Extremely pleased with the craftsmanship of Sean, Robert and Jeff. They were fast, friendly and skilled. Would recommend Deck Masters to anyone looking for quality work.
rawReviews.author: Jackie Slagle

rawReviews.text: True Professional Deck builders. They’ll help you design it and keep it cost efficient. Once started they finished the job quickly. They build very sturdy and good looking decks to your specifications. We’re very happy with the whole process.
rawReviews.author: Kris Baumgartner

rawReviews.text: We had some damage to our deck railing and stairs. We had Deck Masters add a new railing and staircase to our existing deck.  We are over the moon happy with the team that showed up (Jeff, Sean & Robert) and did the work, super professional and provided top notch quality work!!  Jackie provided wonderful communication and project management skills throughout the process, making it a seamless process from start to finish. Highly recommend Deck Masters!!!!
rawReviews.author: Jason Slagle

rawReviews.text: I had 2 decks replaced with the wonderful crew of Deck Masters. The decks are a work of art! The carpentors are so skilled. I am so happy with the results.Thank You Deck Master team!
rawReviews.author: Peggy Robinson

rawReviews.text: Deck Masters did a great job on our new deck! They were professional and great communicators. We sought out several quotes for our project and they provided the greatest value at the lowest cost. And once they broke ground they were impressively quick to complete the project! Highly recommend them!
rawReviews.author: Kyle Hooley

rawReviews.text: They did a full deck tear down and replacement. Good quality work. Good communications.
rawReviews.author: Nic Williams

rawReviews.text: Really appreicate the work done on our deck repair project. Jackie was extremely communicative and kept us informed throughout the process.
rawReviews.author: Chase Daniels

rawReviews.text: Deck Masters insite and communication from the first meeting with Andrew was impressive. They recognized our vision from the start and built a beautiful cedar and glass solarium on our deck that is stunning. The craftsmen who worked on site were perfectionists, respectful, immaculate, and listened & acted on our input. There were no cost overrides. We will be hiring Deck Masters for future projects.
rawReviews.author: Gail Coons

rawReviews.text: I am handicapped and was in need of a ramp, and Deck Masters had a ramp that was not being used and they donated it to me...truly appreciate it!
rawReviews.author: April Krause

rawReviews.text: We appreciated the work they did on our steps. They were willing to accommodate our multiple design changes, their communication was great, and the quality and speed of the work was excellent. We feel like we got an excellent price for the work, and didn’t sacrifice any quality for what we paid
rawReviews.author: Peter Werts

rawReviews.text: Deck Masters did a fantastic job on our deck project. They were very competent from the planning, permitting and finally the execution. Very helpful in all facets leading up to the actual deconstruction, new install and final clean up. Couldn’t be more pleased with the product and the interaction between us and Deck Masters. If Google had a 6th star I’d give it to them.
rawReviews.author: Chip Alvord

rawReviews.text:
I raally like our new deck! The cables from the railing enable us to see the whole back yard. The pipe stairway railing is really sturdy!. Color is good. We are glad to have a sturdy new deck!
Marilyn and Phil  Freitag
rawReviews.author: philip freitag

rawReviews.text:
I hired Deck Masters to build a pad for my shed in addition to assembling it. Finally the weather cooperated and they were able to get my project  scheduled the day following my call from Jackie. David was the expert assigned. He was professional and knowledgeable in the area of his tasks, completed the project timely and even built a ramp to assist in putting my snowblower and such into the shed with ease. All in all, it was a little pricey however worth it. I'd recommend Deck Masters to anyone needing exterior home projects done.
D Dearman
rawReviews.author: Debra Dearman

rawReviews.text: Professional, honest, and humble. Willing to customize without exorbitant fees. I added a spiral staircase that is better than I imagined. Highly recommend
rawReviews.author: Jack hartmann

rawReviews.text: Great company to work with. They were fast and effective. Communication was great and the work is very affordable. Quality work also. I would definitely get in touch with them again when I need more jobs done.
rawReviews.author: Raynaldo Saephanh

rawReviews.text: Had an awesome experience with Deck Masters! Very professional, Andrew made sure everything was exactly the way we wanted it! I love my new wraparound deck, and the rock face that they put underneath it! I can’t recommend them enough 5+ stars !!
rawReviews.author: Connie McCoy

rawReviews.text: More expensive, but worth it. They paid attention, and the deck and dog run look great. Many thanks to Jordan and Jackie!
rawReviews.author: Bruce Wood

rawReviews.text: Deck Masters just finished our deck and I couldn’t be happier! The quality of work and the kindness of the staff goes way above and beyond. I did a lot of reading reviews on this company and I must say they were all excellent and I went back at least 6 years before I decided to go with them. It took awhile to get the project started but I’m glad we had the patience to wait. I would definitely use them again and I’m already recommending them to our friends. Thank you Jordan for the communication and Robert thank you for your hard work! Your group is awesome.
rawReviews.author: Lenora Baker

rawReviews.text:
12/18/2025 Edit

Over the last few months, the owner of DeckMasters (Jordan Webb) has been diligent in working with us to resolve our concerns. I am very grateful for his communication and responsiveness to all of the issues we raised. Although we had communication and scheduling issues at the beginning of our project, our deck now looks fantastic, and I am confident that others will have a good experience as long as Jordan is involved.
rawReviews.author: Paige Smothers

rawReviews.text: I try to use your card, but my deck is outrageous.thank you so much. Outstanding.
rawReviews.author: Chucky Blake

rawReviews.text: Deck masters did a wonderful job! Was getting ready to PCS and rent out my spot, Jordan and Andrew and team understood the assignment and came and got it squared away. Deck turned out beautiful, the price was right, the team was super responsive and respectful to the current tenets. 10/10 Would recommended them to anyone looking to get a deck done in Anchorage Ak.
rawReviews.author: d meeks

rawReviews.text:
We recently completed a very large, complex project with Deckmasters. Like any project of this size, there were challenges along the way, but I can confidently say we are incredibly satisfied with the end result and would highly recommend them.

Our original scope was already ambitious: replacing our second-story wraparound deck, replacing the deck over our garage, and adding a brand-new first-floor deck with stairs connecting the two levels. Partway through, we expanded the project to include replacing all the exterior siding of our home, which was long overdue for repairs. These improvements were critical for both the safety of our kids and the longevity of our home.

Naturally, a project of this size came with its share of hurdles—delays with siding and materials, a septic system replacement (which we handled separately), and, most significantly, discovering major water damage and black mold in the garage walls once the old deck was removed. Deckmasters stepped up in a huge way. They reconstructed the walls of our garage (remarkably without removing the interior drywall or garage doors) saving us significant time and cost. They also rebuilt the garage roof and ensured everything was structurally sound for the long term.

What stood out most was their attention to detail and the work ethic of their crew. Absolutely 10/10. They were respectful, hardworking, and clearly cared about the quality of their work. Communication wasn’t perfect at every stage, but whenever we raised concerns, the team responded with ownership and genuine effort to resolve the issue. To improve things, they even set up weekly in-person check-ins with us, which went a long way in my book. Their commitment to doing the best job possible was evident throughout this entire experience.

We’d like to give a special shoutout to Sean, who not only treated our home as if it were his own but also personally repaired the serious issues with our garage roof and walls like a real-life magician. On top of that, he quickly became a favorite of our dogs, delivering daily attention and treats. :) It may seem like a simple thing, but our dogs are part of our family and we noticed his care for them. Jordan Webb handled some of the hardest points of the project with humility. After a roofer left us in the lurch with a sub-par job and an exposed roof in the rain, I had a full-blown anxiety attack. Jordan listened, let me vent and cry, apologized, and quickly brought in a new roofer who finished the job correctly. His integrity and the pride he takes in his work is clear, and his focus on details that affected the safety of our kids meant a lot to us.

Justin deserves huge credit for meticulously replacing our siding, soffit, and fascia. Our house is an odd shape with tricky angles, but he measured and cut everything with precision so the new materials fit beautifully. He even adjusted deck boards on our back deck after I pointed out that a gap between the deck and the house wasn’t perfectly parallel (small details that made a big difference in the finished product). Robert, Quillin, and Cameron were wizards when it came to finishing touches—replacing scratched boards, repairing minor details we flagged and then some, and framing our lower deck with real craftsmanship.

Above all, every single member of this crew was kind and respectful. That goes a long way in my book. Big projects are never perfect, but Deckmasters proved themselves to be problem-solvers who care deeply about both their craft and their clients. We’re grateful for all their hard work and proud of the home we now have because of them.
rawReviews.author: Rachel Blakeslee

rawReviews.text: This company works hard to make sure communication is on point and works through unforeseen circumstances to create a beautiful deck for our home. Strong skills and workmanship.
rawReviews.author: G Goins

rawReviews.text: Deck Masters had to work hard to finish on time, but they did, and their workmanship made it all worth it. Beautiful deck. Thank you.
rawReviews.author: Gary Goins, MS, BSN, RN

rawReviews.text: I really appreciate Deck Masters and would definitely use them again. At every stage they were friendly, easy to reach, professional and dependable. I had a general idea of what I wanted and they offered some additional suggestions, and I ended up with front and back decks that I love, and my friends and neighbors do, too. They kept me informed at every stage and always gave me at least a week’s advance notice before starting any work. Really great company, wonderful people to work with.
rawReviews.author: Shelly Wells

rawReviews.text:
Our deck is lovely!
The team was / is great to work with. Nothing is ever " perfect " but Deckmasters is responsive to questions or concerns and addresses them promptly and professionally.
We will work with them again on other projects.
Highly recommend.
rawReviews.author: P Gam

rawReviews.text:
Deck Masters just finished a huge project for us — not just a deck, but siding, roof work, and repairing framing after water damage. There were a few hiccups along the way, but Jordan Web was super professional and communicative, working with us to find solutions as issues came up.

Sean on Jordan’s crew was amazing, especially with the water damage repairs — he minimized the impact and kept things moving. It wasn’t an easy job, but they took the time to do it right, and we really appreciate their integrity and dedication.
rawReviews.author: Matthew Blakeslee

rawReviews.text: Professional,  precise, prompt, perfection, clean, accurate. Good clean up.  Highly recommendable
rawReviews.author: Ruth Mcnearney

rawReviews.text: I’ve worked with Jordan and the guys over at Deck Masters in a few different ways and as a fellow business owner I really admire these guys. They have a smooth operation and work with info on and integrity. Couldn’t recommend them enough!
rawReviews.author: Jesse Miessner

rawReviews.text: Highly recommend Deck Master. They did a beautiful job, we did have a couple installment issues as our deck was challenging but they made sure it was fixed and we were happy. Very friendly and helpful. I am so glad we decided to go with them!
rawReviews.author: Kelsey Janes

rawReviews.text:
My experience with Deck Masters, was overall pretty great. We had some issues with communication initially with an employee that is no longer in the role, but Jordan, Andrew, and Jackie were able to straighten everything out before the scheduled date the project was set to begin. Even companies that perform at a high level end up going through some rough spots, and in my opinion it's not whether or not those rough spots happen, but how they handle them. Deck Masters handled it fantastically.

I had a simple small 2nd floor back deck that needed to be replaced, ours was original from 45yrs ago, and was in awful condition. Their demo crew came out and had it down in about an hour, and the trash gone 30min later. About 2 weeks later, their build crew came out, and had the deck done in less than 24hrs. Now my wife and I will need our front deck redone just to match! Thank you guys for helping us out. We love the New Deck.
rawReviews.author: Joshua Swan

rawReviews.text: It's always a pleasure to watch great crews work together. From the demo guys to the framers to the final details guy, everyone was professional.  The Trex looks fantastic!
rawReviews.author: Alaskadk

rawReviews.text: They were so helpful and answered all my questions in advance. Jackie was so kind to send me multiple examples to help me determine which color would be best for my project.
rawReviews.author: terry Park

rawReviews.text: Great dock, crew was professional and easy to work with and working with Jackie and Andrew was a very pleasant experience! Would hire them again!
rawReviews.author: Brandon France

testimonials.quote: Deck Masters exceeded expectations! Andrew ensured every detail was perfect, and I absolutely love my new wraparound deck and the beautiful rock face underneath. Truly 5+ stars!
testimonials.author: Connie McCoy

testimonials.quote: Jordan and Andrew's team at Deck Masters did a wonderful job. Our deck turned out beautiful, the price was right, and they were incredibly responsive and respectful. Highly recommended for any deck project in Anchorage!
testimonials.author: d meeks

testimonials.quote: Deckmasters handled a massive project for us, including a new multi-level deck, siding, and structural repairs. Despite challenges, their attention to detail, strong work ethic, and problem-solving skills were outstanding. Incredibly satisfied with the result and their care for our home.
testimonials.author: Rachel Blakeslee
